attributes.action: PLEASE scrap the so called Bidding system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This bidding system where you bid for a council place is a waste of time, myself and my family all share the living room as our bedroom as the rest of the flat is covered in mould from rising damp (which the council refuse to sort out even though it was here before we moved in, which we had to take or be refused housing again, even though its damaged my childrens health) We like many can not get anywhere else to live because people who don't actually need housing are higher on the bidding list.
